skins.shipDescription: Nelson-class battleship C Nelson, Hull Number 28!
skins.selfIntroduction: If you don't know who I am, go back to the naval academy and start over. I have no need of a commander who doesn't know me. ... You're calling me slow?! Huh?! That's brave of you to say... Stand still, I'll launch some knowledge into your head with my cannons!
skins.acquisition: You're the commander? You don't look very capable to me, though. I'm Nelson. I'll be following your orders, for now.
skins.login: Hmph. Are you done lazing around? I sorted out your documents, so I'm hoping you'll get some things done.
skins.details: What are you staring at?! Keep it up and I'll gouge your eyes out!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Experience from what's known as "failure"? Only a loser would say something like that!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I'm not just talking about you, but those who wave around empty words of "friendship" and "efforts" do not belong here.
skins.secretaryIdle3: One should only do work one is capable of. You still don't have what it takes to be entrusted with important tasks... Keep honing your skills.
skins.secretaryTouch: Are you trying to get a taste of my cannons?!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Off to the bottom of Trafalgar with you, Com-man-der!

skins.shipDescription: This costume... *Sigh*, whatever. It's Halloween, so some kind of entertainment is to be expected. But listen here: I'm not dressing up because I WANT to participate, okay?!
skins.acquisition: This costume... *Sigh*, whatever. It's Halloween, so some kind of entertainment is to be expected. But listen here: I'm not dressing up because I WANT to participate, okay?!
skins.login: I'll overlook your slacking at least for Halloween. But when this day is over, you don't get to slack off any more!
skins.details: I wasn't really planning on dressing up at all. I was just a little curious, so... I-it looks good on me? ... T-thanks... Hey, don't get carried away!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Stop taking pictures, Rodney! I don't want people to see me like this...!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I guess it's okay to have fun with everyone like this sometimes... What? Did I say something funny?
skins.secretaryIdle3: What are you standing around for? It's a holiday; don't you have better things to do?
skins.secretaryTouch: If you try anything weird at all... then you'll be in a world of pain!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Do you wanna end up like this pumpkin?!
